explanation: This configuration compresses the room into three zones: a collaborative workspace around the counter, a comprehensive storage area, and a utilities corner for printing, lighting and waste disposal.

0.description: A collaborative zone around the main counter combining seating and key digital equipment for group work.

1.description: An all-in-one storage zone with cabinets, boxes, bags, papers and books neatly arranged.

2.description: A support corner hosting the printer, lighting fixture and waste bins to service the entire room.
